text: You're in trouble, Goldbird. Turn off your weapons and do what we say.

speaker: player

speaker: player

speaker: player

speaker: alSimon
text:
I don't think you realize you've nowhere to escape, we've got you in our claws.

What we want is simple - give us your cargo, and there's a chance we'll let you go.

speaker: player
text: I thought I was the "Goldbird", now you have claws too?

speaker: alSimon
text: Goldbird, that's what we call ones like you, in your large, gilded craft. You Crown lot really love your wasteful luxuries, don't you?

speaker: alSimon
text:
You got me off track there.

We've come to take your cargo, but we're feeling merciful today. If everything goes smoothly, we'll let you live.

We're in trouble, in fact. We signed up for this new business offering in the capital [city of some planet].
It all looked good, just a simple private mail carrier service. Soon after signing up we learned of the true nature of the job - piracy.
